description.value:
Activate 1 Interact

Often taken recreationally, mindmurk oil dulls the mind, creating a pleasant and euphoric stupor that inhibits the imbiber's decision-making skills and mental capacity.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20]

Onset 30 minutes

Maximum Duration 1 hour

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} (5 minutes)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} (5 minutes)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 3} (5 minutes).

publication.title: Pathfinder Society Scenario #1-23: The Star-Crossed Court
